name: EnjoyableWarmth
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bio-burner”
”Alexa, increase the bio-burner by 20 percent”
”Alexa, set the bio-burner to sixty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use your voice to control your Enjoyable Warmth device. You can turn on and off your device, as well as turn it up and down.

When enabling this skill, you are asked to login with your Enjoyable Warmth account. Once logged in, all your Enjoyable Warmth devices will be known to Alexa.
